author: Daniel Villarreal
title: FBI Raids Medical Spa for Providing False Coronavirus Treatments of High Doses of Vitamin C
description: "We are using high-dose IV vitamin C to help support peoples' immune systems and to help those with the virus recover quicker," the spa's founder said.
content: Agents with the Federal Bureau of Investigation raided the Allure Medical Spa in Shelby Township, Michigan on Thursday over the spa's alleged offering of intravenous vitamin C injections as treatments against coronavirus. No arrests were made or charges filed… [+2410 chars]
